comments:
I use StructureFactory.createEmbeddedImage(library.embeddedImage) create a EmbeddedImage instance, when i use ModuleHandle.addImage to add this instance to a ReportDesignHandle, a exception was thrown. Here is a exception stack trace snapshot.

org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.metadata.PropertyValueException: The value "Eclipse-Web-Tools-226.gif" is invalid with the type "element".
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.metadata.StructRefPropertyType.validateValue(StructRefPropertyType.java:129)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.metadata.PropertyDefn.validateValue(PropertyDefn.java:683)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.command.PropertyCommand.checkItem(PropertyCommand.java:1005)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.command.PropertyCommand.addItem(PropertyCommand.java:441)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.ModuleHandle.addImage(ModuleHandle.java:199)

Fixed
(The reference property that refers to the parent embedded image structure will not be validated when adding the image)

traces.message: The value "Eclipse-Web-Tools-226.gif" is invalid with the type "element".
